text: Lanu-puisto is a park near Pikku-Vesijärvi in Lahti, Finland. It contains 12 statues by Olavi Lanu, made of concrete. It was built 1988–1992. ==References== *Statues *Olavi Lanu in Lahti library's pages Category:Parks in Europe Category:Geography of Finland Category:1992 establishments in Europe Category:1990s establishments in Finland
title: Lanu-puisto
